info.author: Orbtech, L.L.C. and contributors
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Library or Lesser General Public License (LGPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Application Frameworks
info.description:
Allows the use of PasteScript_ to create new Pylons_ applications
pre-configured to leverage Schevo_ and other useful packages.

.. _Schevo: http://schevo.org/

.. _Pylons: http://pylonshq.com/

.. _PasteScript: http://pythonpaste.org/script/

You can also download the `latest development version 
<http://github.com/11craft/schevopylons/tarball/master#egg=SchevoPylons-dev>`__.
info.name: SchevoPylons
info.summary: Templates and support for creating Schevo+Pylons applications
info.html_description:
Allows the use of PasteScript to create new Pylons applications pre-configured to leverage Schevo and other useful packages.

You can also download the latest development version.
